IP.Name: GTZC
IP.About: GTZC : Global Trust Zone Software Controler

RefParameter.Name: TZSC_Lock
RefParameter.Comment: Lock the configuration of TZSC (Peripherals & MPCWM) until next reset

RefParameter.Name: TZSC_Secure_IP_Choice
RefParameter.DefaultValue: by Individual Securing from full Not Secured

PossibleValue.Value: by Individual Securing from full Not Secured

PossibleValue.Value: by Individual Unsecuring from full Secured

RefParameter.Name: MPCBB_SRWILADIS
RefParameter.Comment: Authorize Secure Read/Write on Non-secure area

PossibleValue.Comment: Secure Read/Write access not allowed on non-secure SRAM block
Secure Read/Write access allowed on non-secure SRAM block
Default state (source clock secured if a secure area exists in the MPCBB and vice-versa)
Invert the state, source clock remains secure even if no secure block is set in the MPCBB
MPCBB configuration settings are not locked
MPCBB configuration settings are locked until next reset
MPCBB memory attribute settings are not locked
MPCBB memory attribute settings are locked until next reset

RefParameter.Name: MPCBB1_NonSecureArea_Choice
RefParameter.DefaultValue: Use default memory template from partition_stm32l5xx.h

PossibleValue.Value: Use default memory template from partition_stm32l5xx.h
PossibleValue.Comment: Use default memory template from partition_stm32l5xx.h
